Subject: [junit] org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener



Hi all, 

currently i try to substitute for the junit3.x gui. 
to this end i have to implement 

org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener 

I think it would be reasonable, 
to extend this interface: 
- start test: report timeout if any 
- ignore test: report reason. 

what do you think of it? 

Greetings 

Ernst
